ground_truth: The boy watches from long grass. He gives a smile as dry as the flat plains which stretch out to the hills on the horizon and accompanies Sarah down the hill away from the cemetery. The sun sets on the darkening plains and hills. Darkness settles on the house and buildings of Faraway Downs. The lights go out. Sarah is asleep in bed. moonlight filtering through the curtains. Fletcher looks out at the night and urges an Aboriginal lady indoors. As King George chants by a fire. Sarah sits bolt upright in bed and lights a lamp. Something moves beneath the steps she is standing on and King George dances by his hilltop fire. She hurries indoors to find the boy in her bedroom.
